comments:
I crashed and had to remove the .snap file to recover my workspace.
In this workspace when I want to do a team operation I get a parent is not 
managed by CVS error. I can't disconnect and reconnect the project to fix this.
When I then go to the CVS preference page I get:
===

More info: after doing a refresh from local the problem below went away.

I assume we ended up with a discrepency between the IResources and the sync 
info.  Softer failure would be better.

The NPE can be reproduced by the following scenario:
1. Checkout a project
2. Quit eclipse
3. Remove the Root file from the CVS directory of the project
4. Restart Eclipse
5. Go to the project properties

Performing a sync after the above scenario will result in another misleading 
error (Parent not managed).
